articles.description: The London-born star was scheduled to perform a series of concerts at Sin City's Caesars Palace, but they were cancelled just 24 hours before the opening show.
articles.content: Adele has said the public backlash to her having to postpone her Las Vegas residency was 'brutal' and left her a 'shell of a person'. The London-born star was scheduled to perform a series of concert… [+4411 chars]

articles.title: Full Monty star Hugo Speer sacked from Disney+ reboot series over 'inappropriate conduct' claims - Sky News
articles.content:
Hugo Speer has been sacked from the forthcoming series of The Full Monty after allegations of "inappropriate conduct".
The actor was due to reprise the role of Guy from the original hit film but he … [+1321 chars]
